value.title: Here are the top 10 ways robotics is benefiting brick and mortar stores in 2021
value.excerpt: The utilization of robots in the logistics and production network empowers retailers to accomplish sizeable reserve funds. Here are the top 10 ways robotics is benefiting brick and mortar stores.

value.title: These Robots Follow You to Learn Where to Go
value.excerpt: Burro makes carts that help growers of trees and vineyards with harvests. Meanwhile, the maker of Vespa scooters wants to carry your groceries.

value.title: AI and Simulation Driving Major Advances in Robotics
value.excerpt: Whether autonomously moving parts and products or visually inspecting goods for defects, the rapid growth of e-commerce, onshoring of manufacturing and labor shortages have accelerated the urgency for robotics deployment and automation.

value.title: Giving robots social skills
value.excerpt: MIT researchers have developed a control framework that enables robots to understand what it means to help or hinder one another and incorporate social reasoning into the tasks they are accomplishing.

value.title: Pro and Con: Artificial Intelligence
value.excerpt: Some people contend artificial intelligence can improve workplace safety, offer accessibility for people with disabilities, and make everyday life more convenient and enjoyable; others contend artificial intelligence poses dangerous privacy risks,

value.title: Cobi robot autonomously performs needle-less vaccinations
value.excerpt: It goes without saying that a lot of people are receiving the COVID-19 vaccine these days, and will continue to do so for some time. A new robot is designed to help streamline the process, by autonomously – and needle-lessly – vaccinating human patients.

value.title: Flippy 2 kitchen robot can singlehandedly work a fast food fry station
value.excerpt: Flippy the burger-flipping robot has received an upgrade as Miso Robotics rolls out its Flippy 2 model. Taking on board feedback from a pilot program with the White Castle hamburger chain that started in Chicago in September 2020,

value.title: Cloud datacenters anticipated to become largely robot-dependent by 2025
value.excerpt: In a strong endorsement to the value of artificial intelligence and machine learning, research firm Gartner predicts that half of cloud datacenters will be leveraging advanced robots by 2025. Gartner believes these AI-centered deployments will ramp up the operating efficiency of datacenters by a margin of 30%.

value.title: Scale AI acquires SiaSearch to give companies the same data engine superpowers that Tesla has
value.excerpt: Scale AI, the five-year-old visual data labeling company, has acquired a small startup that could help expand its reach in Europe and speed up development of its newest product. Financial terms were not disclosed.

value.title: Why You Should Make Artificial Intelligence Part Of Your Digital Strategy
value.excerpt: AI is being used in many ways today to make our lives better. It's assisting us with complex tasks that we can't do by ourselves, creating a symbiosis between humans and machines that allows both to achieve more than they can alone.

value.title: Has Robotics Finally Arrived? Benefits Emerge in the Store, Microfulfillment Center and Last Mile
value.excerpt: Robots are already an established part of large-scale warehouses run by behemoths like Amazon. They move swiftly and at scale, covering a lot of ground in a stable, well-routed environment designed specifically for them.

value.title: Robot food delivery, coming soon to a campus near you
value.excerpt: Robots navigate the Bowling Green State University campus in Bowling Green, Ohio on Thursday, Oct. 13, 2021. Robot food delivery is no longer the stuff of science fiction. value.title: Iron Ox Launches Grover, an All-New Autonomous Mobile Robot
value.excerpt: Iron Ox, a farming innovation company with deep expertise in plant science, robotics and artificial intelligence, is launching a first-of-its kind mobile support robot named Grover. Grover is not your average farmer.

value.title: Fighting Fires and Floods with Robotics, AI, and IoT

value.title: From a garage to Swiss lakes and rivers: the story of Proteus, an underwater robot
value.excerpt: The project involved underwater robots, also known as Remotely Operated Vehicles (ROVs). But now Christian wanted to step it up a gear. He not only wanted to build an ROV, but he also wanted to take part at the international MATE ROV Competition 2019 – the biggest ROV competition in the world.

value.title: Samsung's Jet Bot AI+ robot vacuum is a must-have for pet owners
value.excerpt: The Samsung JetBot AI+ looks like the robot vacuum of the future, and has some ultramodern tech under the hood. Credit: leah stodart / mashable Despite their overall hands-off capabilities, most robot vacuums require some sort of pre-cleaning to avoid eaten phone chargers or socks.
